channel.title: Choose a program on AIT TR static site
channel.description: Recent content in Choose a program on AIT TR static site

item.title: Backend Development
item.description: Dive into fundamentals of Java, Spring, Spring Boot, Hibernate, and a wide array of other tools to build mobile and web applications as well as backend services and APIs.

item.title: Frontend Development
item.description: Use HTML, CSS, Javascript, ReactJS, Redux, and NodeJS to create modern Front-End applications, services, and interfaces.

item.title: QA Manual and Automated Testing
item.description: Ensure proper quality of applications and services with manual and automated testing using Selenium, Appium, Cucumber, and Postman.

item.title: Nocode and Digital Marketing
item.description: Learn the best technics for advertising of services and goods through digital channels. Build and promote websites in search engines and on social media.
